columns.Pilot_Id: The unique identifier for each pilot.
columns.Name: The full name of the pilot.
columns.Age: The age of the pilot in years.

pilot.table_description: The table stores pilot information for aircraft operations.

columns.Aircraft_ID: The unique identifier for each aircraft.
columns.Aircraft: The name of the aircraft model.
columns.Description: The functional description of the aircraft.
columns.Max_Gross_Weight: The maximum allowable weight for the aircraft.
columns.Total_disk_area: The total surface area of the aircraft's disks.
columns.Max_disk_Loading: The maximum loading per unit area of the aircraft's disks.

aircraft.table_description: The table stores detailed information about various aircraft models.

columns.Round: The unique identifier for each match round.
columns.Location: The geographical location where the match takes place.
columns.Country: The country hosting the match event.
columns.Date: The scheduled dates for the match round.
columns.Fastest_Qualifying: The pilot achieving the fastest qualifying time.
columns.Winning_Pilot: The unique identifier of the winning pilot.
columns.Winning_Aircraft: The unique identifier of the aircraft used by the winner.

match.table_description: The table records details of match rounds, pilots, and aircraft.

columns.Airport_ID: The unique identifier for each airport.
columns.Airport_Name: The official name of the airport.
columns.Total_Passengers: The total number of passengers using the airport.
columns.%_Change_2007: The percentage change in passenger numbers since 2007.
columns.International_Passengers: The number of international passengers at the airport.
columns.Domestic_Passengers: The number of domestic passengers at the airport.
columns.Transit_Passengers: The number of transit passengers passing through the airport.
columns.Aircraft_Movements: The total number of aircraft movements at the airport.
columns.Freight_Metric_Tonnes: The weight of freight measured in metric tonnes handled by the airport.

airport.table_description: The table organizes comprehensive data about airport operations and passenger statistics.

columns.ID: The unique identifier for each airport-aircraft association.
columns.Airport_ID: The unique identifier for the associated airport.
columns.Aircraft_ID: The unique identifier for the associated aircraft.

airport_aircraft.table_description: The table links airports with their corresponding aircraft equipment.
